summary: A test suite that defines a collection of helper functions and test cases to verify the behavior of filtered tracebacks in a computational library, ensuring that errors raised during various transformations and control‑flow constructs are presented clearly to the user.
business_intent: Validate and improve the debugging experience by confirming that filtered tracebacks correctly isolate user‑level code when exceptions occur inside just‑in‑time compilation, automatic differentiation, vectorization, custom Jacobian‑vector products, and other advanced operations.
